flavorText: "If you think twice, I'll cut twice."

foreignData.flavorText: „Während du zögerst, schlag ich zweimal zu."
foreignData.name: Stachelhorn-Minotaurus
foreignData.text: Solange du in diesem Zug zwei oder mehr Karten gezogen hast, hat der Stachelhorn-Minotaurus Doppelschlag.

foreignData.flavorText: "Si piensas dos veces, te cortaré dos veces".
foreignData.name: Minotauro cuernoespinazo
foreignData.text: Mientras hayas robado dos o más cartas este turno, el Minotauro cuernoespinazo tiene la habilidad de dañar dos veces.

foreignData.flavorText: « Si vous y réfléchissez à deux fois, je frapperai deux fois. »
foreignData.name: Minotaure cornépic
foreignData.text: Tant que vous avez pioché au moins deux cartes ce tour-ci, le Minotaure cornépic a la double initiative.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se ci pensi due volte, taglierò due volte."
foreignData.name: Minotauro Spinocorno
foreignData.text: Se hai pescato due o più carte in questo turno, il Minotauro Spinocorno ha doppio attacco.

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前が二の足を踏むなら、俺は二度斬り付けるぜ。」
foreignData.name: 多角ミノタウルス
foreignData.text: このターンにあなたがカードを２枚以上引いているかぎり、多角ミノタウルスは二段攻撃を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ミノタウルス・狂戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "네가 생각을 두 번 하면, 나는 공격을 두 번 하겠어."
foreignData.name: 척추뿔 미노타우로스
foreignData.text: 당신이 이번 턴에 카드를 두 장 이상 뽑은 한, 척추뿔 미노타우로스는 이단공격을 가진다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se você pensar duas vezes, vou cortar duas vezes."
foreignData.name: Minotauro Cornespíneo
foreignData.text: Desde que você tenha comprado dois ou mais cards neste turno, Minotauro Cornespíneo tem golpe duplo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Пока ты будешь думать, мне хватит времени на два удара».
foreignData.name: Шипорогий Минотавр
foreignData.text: Шипорогий Минотавр имеет Двойной удар при условии, что в этом ходу вы уже взяли не менее двух карт.

foreignData.flavorText: 「如果你多想一次，我就再砍一次。」
foreignData.name: 脊角牛头怪
foreignData.text: 只要你本回合中已抓两张或更多牌，脊角牛头怪便具有连击异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 「如果你多想一次，我就再砍一次。」
foreignData.name: 脊角牛頭怪
foreignData.text: 只要你本回合中已抽兩張或更多牌，脊角牛頭怪便具有連擊異能。

name: Spinehorn Minotaur
originalText: As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Spinehorn Minotaur has double strike.

rulings.text: Spinehorn Minotaur’s effect applies even if you drew two or more cards only before Spinehorn Minotaur entered the battlefield.
If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” Spinehorn Minotaur’s effect doesn’t count them.

If Spinehorn Minotaur gains double strike only after combat damage has already been dealt (most likely because another creature’s ability caused you to draw a card when it dealt combat damage), Spinehorn Minotaur will deal only normal combat damage.

text: As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Spinehorn Minotaur has double strike.
